Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.2 Akusalapada » 2.3.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
33.
1327Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
1328Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
34.
1329Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1330Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1331Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1332(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
